amendment.description: Add, at the end of the bill, the following (and amend the table of contents accordingly): SEC. 11. LIMITATION ON EXPERT WITNESS TESTIMONY. ***.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Roe (TN).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
